Html: Whatever version of wabbitemu that I have has very limited functionality. There is no "Calculator" menu like I'm seeing in Youtube Videos. Similarly, the "View" menu only has three options, which are "Skin Mode", "Show Toolbar", and "Customize Toolbar". Which is odd, because I've never even seen a toolbar on this thing. Did I download an old version, or is the Mac just have fewer functions than the Windows one? When I first started it, it wouldn't even let me load a ROM because the menu option to do so was grayed out. In desperation, I just dragged the ROM image onto the window and that got me into skin mode, but this program is useless to me if I can't load or export programs and variables.
